Name: Seiga Kaku uses her amazing Taoist arts and gives you a life lesson
About the game: This short visual novel is a derivative work of the Touhou Project. Let the wicked hermit Seiga Kaku share her Taoist wisdom with you. With her help, you will surely achieve your goals in life and become a better person. To the Tao, no problem is insurmountable. Learn about the philosophy of Taoism, and how to apply it to find love, success, and peace of mind. And don't die. Features Two endings with several variation (for a total of 5 different endings) A complete English translation of Tao Te Ching, one of the fundamental texts of Taoism. With in-character notes and interpretations by Seiga Kaku. Original ZUN-style art by Ryann1908 Original meditative music by Bahia Inspired by the games of Sigyaad Team.
